root.name: arch
tip: Show if node is running in 32 or 64 bit mode.

next.tip: Set the default running state to 32bit mode.
Set the default running state to 64bit mode.

root.name: install
tip:
U: install <version> [arch] [--insecure]
Install node.
E: install 18

next.name: lts
next.tip: Install the lts version of node.

options.name: --insecure
options.tip: Bypass SSL validation of the remote download server.

next.name: latest
next.tip: Install the latest version of node.

options.name: --insecure
options.tip: Bypass SSL validation of the remote download server.

root.name: uninstall
tip: Uninstall the specified version of node.

root.name: use
tip: Switch to use the specified version.

root.name: root
tip:
U: root [<path>]
Set the directory where nvm should store different versions of node.js.
If <path> is not set,  the directory where node.js is currently stored will be displayed.

root.name: proxy
tip:
U: proxy [url]
Set a proxy to use for downloads.
Leave [url] blank to see the current proxy
Set [url] to "none" to remove the proxy.

root.name: debug
root.tip: Check the NVM4W process for known problems (troubleshooter)

root.name: node_mirror
tip:
U: node_mirror [url]
Set the node mirror.
Defaults to https://nodejs.org/dist/
Leave [url] blank to use default url.

root.name: npm_mirror
tip:
U: npm_mirror [url]
Set the npm mirror.
Defaults to https://github.com/npm/cli/archive/
Leave [url] blank to default url.

root.name: version
root.tip: Displays the current running version of nvm.

options.name: --version
options.tip: Displays the current running version of nvm.
